entry.title: Tuesday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 2 with temperature rising to plus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2 with temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 5 this evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A few showers. High 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few showers beginning early in the morning and ending late in the afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 near noon then light late in the afternoon. High 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023
